CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gyrodyne LLC is a limited liability company operating in the United States. The company leases and manages diverse commercial properties such as medical office and industrial properties. The properties owned by the company include Cortlandt Manor, Flowerfield, Port Jefferson and the Grove.
